abstract: Police have detained 22 people in an investigation that has ensnared McDonalds, Whirlpool, McKinsey and ABB.
snippet: Police have detained 22 people in an investigation that has ensnared McDonalds, Whirlpool, McKinsey and ABB.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI, Jan. 19 — The Shanghai police have detained 22 people in a bribery investigation that has ensnared some of the world’s biggest companies, including McDonalds, Whirlpool, McKinsey and ABB, according to reports in the state-run news media.

headline.main: Shanghai Bribery Inquiry Ensnares Big Firms
